alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 4:25PM MST until June 23 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 425 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Piestewa Peak Park, or near Phoenix, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Paradise Valley, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, McDowell Mountain Park, North Mountain Park, Downtown Scottsdale, Metro Center Mall and Scottsdale Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 202 and 222. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 153 and 160. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
